title: The Return
creator_credit: Sture Rydman, Elizabeth McKay and Jocelyn Films
brief_description: Edwardian England, a boarded-up mansion and rumours of ghosts provide some of the necessary ingredients for this compelling suspense film based on two short stories - “Nobody’s House” by A.M. Burrage and “The Middle Toe of the Right Foot” by Ambrose Bierce. A man who is seeking vindication of the man suspected of killing his bride shuts himself in the wedding room and confronts the ghosts of the bride.
